line_text: Identity theft is not a joke, Jim!
speaker: Dwight Schrute

line_text: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
speaker: Michael Scott

line_text: Whenever I'm about to do something, I think, 'Would an idiot do that?' And if they would, I do not do that thing.
speaker: Dwight Schrute

line_text: I love inside jokes. I'd love to be a part of one someday.
speaker: Michael Scott

line_text: Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both. I want people to be afraid of how much they love me.
speaker: Michael Scott

line_text: I am running away from my responsibilities. And it feels good.
speaker: Michael Scott

line_text: Sometimes I'll start a sentence and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way.
speaker: Michael Scott

line_text: I'm an early bird and a night owl. So I'm wise and I have worms.
speaker: Michael Scott

line_text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
speaker: Wayne Gretzky

line_text: I talk a lot, so I've learned to tune myself out.
speaker: Kelly Kapoor

line_text: I worked in a paper company for 25 years. A lot of people don't have that kind of patience.
speaker: Stanley Hudson
